sentences.english: The birth of rearward-firing missiles has changed the concept of aerial warfare, according to Wu.
sentences.chinese: 據吳聲稱，後射導彈的出現改變了空戰的概念。

sentences.english: The Libyan air campaign could not have been fought without American help.
sentences.chinese: 離開美國的幫助，利比亞空戰也無從展開。

sentences.english: This paper treats the several key technical problems on attack helicopter air-combat.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了武裝直升機空戰的幾個關鍵技術問題。

sentences.english: The Air Force has studied air combat since World War I.
sentences.chinese: 美國空軍自第一次世界大戰以來一直在研究空戰。

sentences.english: Evaluation of air-to-air tactics(AAT) is a nuclear question of simulation experiment on air-to-air fight(AAF).
sentences.chinese: 空戰戰法的評估是空戰仿真實驗的核心理論問題。

sentences.english: Evaluation of air-to-air tactics(AAT) is a nuclear question of simulation experiment on air-to-air fight(AAF).
sentences.chinese: 空戰戰法的評估是空戰仿真實驗的核心理論問題。

sentences.english: It was in the air war lasting several years preceding June 1944
sentences.chinese: 而1944年6月前空戰一直在持續着。

sentences.english: It is important for fighter to have good maneuver ability in air combat.
sentences.chinese: 近距空戰要求新一代戰鬥機具有較好的機動性能。

sentences.english: Who wants to watch some aerial battles filmed in IMAX by John Woo?
sentences.chinese: 誰想看吳宇森執導的IMAX版的空戰電影啊？

sentences.english: It holds the longest time and largest scale in terms of air-fight in The Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 這是第二次世界大戰中時間最長規模最大的一次空戰。

sentences.english: Other Allied nations participated in the naval and air forces.
sentences.chinese: 其他同盟國家參與了海戰和空戰。

sentences.english: Multi-UAV cooperative combat is the primary air combat mode in the future.
sentences.chinese: 多無人機協同作戰是未來空戰的主要模式。

definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
